verbose_text: The luciferase reporter assay showed that overexpression of RBFOX3 dramatically enhanced the hTERT promoter activity in contrast to the vector group in QGY7703 and SNU-449 cells, whereas knockdown of RBFOX3 significantly decreased the hTERT promoter activity in HepG2 and Hep3B cells in contrast to the non specific shRNA control (shNC) groups.
